review: This worthless, square hockey puck makes the Xbox 360 look reliable. It might still be useful though; as a door stop, paper weight, sanding block, or put it in a sock and use it for self defense.
author: Robert J Grbavac

review: Love it! Ended up loving the Apple TV so much we bought a second!

review: Works well. Able to cast videos easily from any site that are viewed/opened in any Brower apps installed.The screen resolution when mirrored from ipad air on a 40 inch tv does not come as full screen.
